author: Neil Green
comment: Beautiful watch face in both black and white backgrounds. My issue is with changing the background by tapping face. This should be done in a settings menu. Also there are no hour dashes in ambient mode. (My preference). Please fix in future versions.

reply.author: MR.TIME LAB
reply.content:
Hi. We are MR.TIME.

Thank you for using Mr.Time clock.

Change your inquire theme as one of its clock function, can not be changed.

We will strive to provide better service.

Thank you.

title: Beautiful face with two annoying exceptions

author: Dave Morris
comment: Please make the option to have the face black or white an option behind the scenes, NOT a click of the face, this way there's no accidental clicks...

reply.author: MR.TIME LAB
reply.content:
Hi. We are MR.TIME.

Thank you for using Mr.Time clock.

Change your inquire theme as one of its clock function, can not be changed.

Additional inquiries, please contact mrtimemaker@apposter.com.

Thank you.
